comments:
The impact is that a URL Test cannot be run.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Install 3.0_20050324_1643 build of Hyades 3.3
2. Perform HTTP recording
3. Stop recording


The testgen progress indicator remains in the same state.

The following stack trace is visible in a console:

MESSAGE Can't find resource for bundle org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core
.ManifestLocalization$LocalizationResourceBundle, key W_LOOP
!STACK 0
java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find resource for bundle org.eclipse.o
sgi.framework.internal.core.ManifestLocalization$LocalizationResourceBundle, key
 W_LOOP
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getObject(ResourceBundle.java(Compiled Code)
)
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getObject(ResourceBundle.java(Compiled Code)
)
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getObject(ResourceBundle.java(Compiled Code)
)
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getString(ResourceBundle.java(Compiled Code)
)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.ui.internal.util.ResourceBundleManager.getString(R
esourceBundleManager.java)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.java.TestJavaPlugin.getString(TestJavaPlugin.
java:171)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.testgen.http.TRCContext.createLoop(TRCCo
ntext.java:177)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.testgen.http.TRCContext.newTestSuiteCont
ext(TRCContext.java:95)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.testgen.http.TRCFileLoader.load(TRCFileL
oader.java:86)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.testgen.http.Testgen.runTestGen(Testgen.
java:77)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.testgen.TestGenerator.run(TestG
enerator.java:94)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java(Inlined Co

This regression was introduced with the fix for bugzilla_73031.  Several 
strings were moved from the test.java plugin to the test.common plugin, and 
these referneces to those strings were not updated.  I corrected the 
references to W_LOOP and W_LWR_INV.  My search didn't find other occurances of 
these strings in Hyades code (although other adopting produtcs may have 
references to these strings, and would thus be affected by this as well.)  
(Todd)
